Episodes.Title: Episode #3.1
Episodes.Actors: Annabelle Wallis, Cillian Murphy, Branwell Donaghey
Episodes.Plot: It is Thomas Shelby's long-awaited wedding day. A mysterious visitor imperils the entire Shelby family, and Tommy finds himself pulled into a web of intrigue more lethal than anything he has yet encountered.

Episodes.Title: Episode #3.2
Episodes.Actors: Cillian Murphy, Ralph Ineson, Paddy Considine
Episodes.Plot: Tommy discovers the extent of the mission given to him and the extreme lengths his new paymasters are willing to go to in their quest for power. Meanwhile his own family's activities lead to escalating danger in Birmingham.

Episodes.Title: Episode #3.3
Episodes.Actors: Cillian Murphy, Helen McCrory, Sophie Rundle
Episodes.Plot: Tommy travels to Wales seeking absolution and uncovers a traitor in the Economic League. Michael develops a taste for guns. Arthur gets good news.

Episodes.Title: Episode #3.4
Episodes.Actors: Cillian Murphy, Paul Anderson, Joe Cole
Episodes.Plot: Polly goes to confession, igniting a chain of events that reveals a trap being laid at the Shelbys' expense. Tommy plans an exit from dirty business.

Episodes.Title: Episode #3.5
Episodes.Actors: Cillian Murphy, Sophie Rundle, Finn Cole
Episodes.Plot: As the Russians test the Peaky Blinders, Tommy realises that he is seriously outmaneuvered. But he has an ace up his sleeve.

Episodes.Title: Episode #3.6
Episodes.Actors: Cillian Murphy, Finn Cole, Joe Cole
Episodes.Plot: As Tommy prepares to commit the most audacious crime of his career, an unexpected blow forces him to face his worst fears in a race against time.
